Portal is one of amazing and beautifully designed game I played in my life .Every puzzle is totaly unique with jump simple controls. How could I not played this interesting game before.

The game is fun to play don't get me wrong.
But I finished the game under 2 hours :/
In my opinion the game was a bit too easy and the play time is way too short aswell.
But even with these two points the game is still worth it and has a good story.

Portal ist ein nettes "Rätselspiel" mit einer Story die bis zum Schluss spannend bleibt. Grundsätzlich ist das Prinzip des Spiels durch einen Level zu kommen mit Hilfe von Portalen, hierbei ist jeweils etwas Kreativität gefragt. 2007 war es schon ein super Spiel und auch heute kann ich es nur empfehlen.
Sizi farklı bir dünyaya çağırmak yerine sizin dünyanızı değiştiren efsane bir oyun.
Oynamadıysanız mutlaka oynamanız gereken oyunlardan bir tanesi.

Perfecto por si tienes un pentium 4 con 1gb de ram.
Entretenido y te hace pensar 10/10

Nominado por sacarme del aburrimiento
Just two words come in mind when I try to describe this game: f*cking awesome
Old and short but brillant and different video game, made all the more special by the villain and the best end game song ever
Este juego merece una tercer parte. Una historia magnífica, jugabilidad espectacular, banda sonora <3. 100/100 y eso que soy rata al puntuar :P Te amo Portal!

Доброе утро, дорогие пользователи "Steam". 
В данной игре, про которую я пишу небольшой обзор, нужно решать всякие головоломки, а сколько вы потратите на них время, зависит только от вас.
Суть игры в том, чтобы правильно установить два портала, для того чтобы пройти на следующий уровень.
Игра довольно интересная, она оправдывает свою цену.
Советую вам скорее приобрести данную игру и наслаждаться, ведь деньги вы зря не потеряли.
Всего доброго, пользователи "Steam".
recomendddddd
Muy buen juego
Nice puzzle game. Good diologue. Nice Visuals. Unfortunately the game itself is quite short. But definitely worth the money (especially if its on sale) 7/10
Amazing

Очень интересная гололомка с необычной механикой.

Sooooo, what can I say? Firstly, that was really fun to recognize that you got a pleasure brainstorm which made you think fast and be in a rush in some situations. Secondly, in spite of being a day-fly game ('cause the game took me several hours) I liked it very much and was happy to play the game when I saw on TV-set in one computer game review long time ago. Gameplay was nice, without bags, frosts and other computer shit which disturbs you while you're playing a game. And finally, I spent the time with pleasure and was melted with these turrets (they have cute voice, but made me hurt, little piece of tech bullshit). That's all. Love cakes.
Amazing game 10/10 for real
Muistakaa, kakku on vale.

So..if you're good at Portal, you could probably beat this game in 92 mins like me and still get that refund! But for newer people. Portal is a puzzle and action game. The point is to beat the game by defeating GLaDOS, the rogue wife of Cave Johnson. You utilize Portals to manuver throughout the game, defeat test chambers and ulitmately, but satisfying, defeating GLaDOS. I recommend this game to new players of Portal before you go onto Portal 2, this shows out the basics and cost lest than Portal 2 and is quite fun and challenging! I give this game a Zolty Delphox rating - 8.4/10.
The second one looks better
10/10 would be abused by GLaDOS again
Excellent jeu !
Найс игра!!))Телепорты нахуэ!!!!!

Ein geiles Spiel!!!! Viele regen sich zwar auf das es keine Hilfestellungen gibt aber genau das macht es ja interessant.
Man muss seine "grauen Zellen" wirklich anstrengen um weiter zu kommen.
Ich habe von mal zu mal mehr Ansporn bekommen.
Und es iss ein super Gefühl das Ende des Spieles erreicht zu haben. 
Kann das Spiel und die Fortsetzung nur weiter empfehlen!!!!
Dobrá hra , grafika na tak nízkou cenu super a zážitek nadprůměrný.
This game is amazing. of how the game was made, no lag for me. its just amazing

This game has a really great mix of action, humor, interesting story line, and pace.  So fun to play again after a while.  It has such an interesting back story that you want to learn more about it. This game is an example of why so many people are so fanatical  towards Valve games and crave more sequels.

Corto, entretenido e intenso, que mas puedo pedir
10/10
棒棒

Such a fantastic game. Have bought twice now on different platforms with no regrets. Worth your money. TOTALLY AWESOME!

Great gameplay mechanics. Engaging story. Fun puzzles. Quite funny as well.
The game is not extremely difficult, but hits a sweetspot of challenging yet doable that makes it very entertaining.

Dificil sacarle alguna pega. Un juego innovador, completamente diferentes al resto de juegos. Aporta un tipo de juego divertido, relajado, sin prisas, ni extres, relajante a través de una serie de mapas donde tendrás que ir avanzando y sorteando obstáculos mediante el uso de portales. Da rienda suelta al uso de los portales, desde abrir un portal en el suelo y otro en el techo y empezar una caida eterna jajaja y todo lo que se te imagine. 

Respecto a la jugabilidad, los controles (teclado y ratón en mi caso) son sencillos, intuitivos con una buena banda sonora y una interesante historia de fondo.

Si te gustan los juegos de pensar, divertidos, sin necesidad de estar 2 horas jugando, para esos ratos muertos. Este es tu juego.

Recomendación: 9 / 10.
Juego muy famoso de Valve de puzzles,corto,divertido y una de las mayores obras de arte.Te lo pasaras genial. 9/10

这是我玩过的最好的一款益智策略类游戏。这款游戏细思级恐：人类的工厂内的废水之中有一个机械智慧生命建造的世界，而你作为实验品的一个无辜人类接受机械智能生命的观察与考验，通过传送门制造枪过关最终打败打BOSS。我花了不到3个小时通关，感觉很不错。瘆人的女性机械智能生命的声音不绝于耳，每次她对你表示祝贺时都是你的困难时。当你最终逃出她的掌控，你将有种胜利感的发泄。绝对考验智商，如果玩不下去就别玩了，只要不是弱智都能通关。

Это игра, которая хорошо не только графикой, но и сюжетом. Ёщё это игра очень интересная. В этой игре много тайн, которые до сих пор не разгаданы, возможно. Ратман, Гладос, Чел и др. всё это и есть тайны этой игры.
nice

Although this game is pretty short, I believe that it's a must-have for every steam library. 
Pros:
1. Very unique story and gameplay mechanics
2. Extremely well balanced (Difficulty is just right)
3. Cake

Cons:
1. Game is fairly short (Only takes 3-4 hours to complete)

Overall, I would say it's worth it full price, but it's definitely worth your time and money when it's on sale.

The Cake is a lie!
The Cake is a lie!
The Cake is a lie!
The Cake is a lie!

I really enjoyed playing Portal. At first I felt lost, but eventually my skills improved and I started to get better with each level. I enjoyed the variety of challenges.  The 'narration' had me laughing and smiling constantly. It's really well designed. I tried hard to find glitches and cheats that would get me somewhere with less effort but couldn't find any. There was one time when I did something creative that I don't think was intended, but I'd have to look at the walkthrough to see if I did it differently. I'd highly recommend Portal. I finished the game in a day but there's bonus items and Portal 2 in my library! BTW, if you know about "the lie" achievement in Minecraft when you craft a cake, the reference comes from this game!
Good Puzzle game. Requires creative thinking

1인칭 퍼즐로 게임성이 참신하고 퍼즐도 상당히 잘 구성되었다.
플레이 타임이 길지는 않지만, 정말 금방 지나가는 느낌이다.
흠잡을 데 없는 좋은 게임으로 누구에게나 추천하고 싶은 작품이다.
다만 몇 가지만 아쉬운 부분을 들자면,
퍼즐을 해결하고도 타이밍이나 Aim을 맞추기 어려워 몇 번 다시 시도해야 하는 부분은 아쉬웠다.
